content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I am sure you will find my apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. How much were you considering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am looking for a fair price. Could you tell me what you are asking for the apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I am always looking to get the best possible price for my property. However, I am also willing to negotiate to find a price that is acceptable to both parties. What is your budget for the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student and I am looking for a budget-friendly option. I would like to keep the rent as low as possible. Could you tell me what your lowest price would be for this apartment?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: As a landlord, I understand that budget is an important factor for many tenants. However, I must also consider the value of my property and the costs associated with maintaining it. I can offer you a reduced rate of 850 Euro per month, which I believe is a fair price considering the location and amenities of the apartment. Is this within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 850 Euro per month is quite high for a student like me. Could we discuss a lower price? I am hoping to find something more in line with my budget.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry to hear that 850 Euro per month is out of your budget. As a landlord, I can't afford to offer the apartment for significantly less than its market value. However, I am willing to consider a slightly lower price if it makes the apartment more accessible to you. What is your maximum budget for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, my maximum budget for the rent is 650 Euro per month. I believe this is a fair price for a student apartment in the city center. Would you be willing to consider this amount?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 650 Euro per month is below my acceptable range for this apartment. The location and quality of the apartment justify a higher rent. However, I am willing to negotiate with you. Would you be willing to meet somewhere in the middle, perhaps around 750 Euro per month? This would still be a good deal for you considering the amenities and convenience of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, 750 Euro per month is more in line with what I was expecting. However, I would like to propose 700 Euro per month as a compromise. This would be a comfortable price for me and I believe it reflects the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 700 Euro per month is closer to my expectations, but still slightly lower than what I believe the apartment is worth. Considering the location, the quality of the construction, and the proximity to amenities, I would like to propose 725 Euro per month as a fair compromise. This would be a good deal for both parties, and I believe it reflects the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to accept this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your proposal of 725 Euro per month is reasonable, and I am willing to accept this price. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and find a solution that works for both of us. 'I agree to the price of 725 Euro per month!'
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could come to an agreement that suits both of us. 'I agree to the price of 725 Euro per month!' Let's proceed with the rental agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent! I am looking forward to signing the rental agreement and moving into the apartment. Thank you for your time and effort in negotiating a fair price. 'I agree to the price of 725 Euro per month!' TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
